  • Method Details

    • save

      MediaItem save(MediaItem mediaItem)
      Save a new media item to the database
      Parameters:
      mediaItem - the media item to save
      Returns:
      the saved media item with generated ID

    • update

      MediaItem update(MediaItem mediaItem)
      Update an existing media item
      Parameters:
      mediaItem - the media item to update
      Returns:
      the updated media item

    • findById

      Optional<MediaItem> findById(Integer itemId)
      Find a media item by ID
      Parameters:
      itemId - the item ID
      Returns:
      Optional containing the media item if found

    • findByIsbn

      Optional<MediaItem> findByIsbn(String isbn)
      Find a media item by ISBN
      Parameters:
      isbn - the ISBN
      Returns:
      Optional containing the media item if found

    • findAll

      List<MediaItem> findAll()
      Find all media items
      Returns:
      list of all media items

    • findByType

      List<MediaItem> findByType(String type)
      Find media items by type
      Parameters:
      type - the media type (e.g., BOOK, DVD, MAGAZINE)
      Returns:
      list of media items with the specified type

    • findByTitleContaining

      List<MediaItem> findByTitleContaining(String title)
      Find media items by title (partial match)
      Parameters:
      title - the title to search for
      Returns:
      list of matching media items

    • findByAuthorContaining

      List<MediaItem> findByAuthorContaining(String author)
      Find media items by author (partial match)
      Parameters:
      author - the author to search for
      Returns:
      list of matching media items

    • findAvailableItems

      List<MediaItem> findAvailableItems()
      Find available media items (availableCopies > 0)
      Returns:
      list of available media items

    • deleteById

      boolean deleteById(Integer itemId)
      Delete a media item by ID
      Parameters:
      itemId - the item ID
      Returns:
      true if deleted successfully

    • updateAvailableCopies

      void updateAvailableCopies(Integer itemId, Integer availableCopies)
      Update available copies count
      Parameters:
      itemId - the item ID
      availableCopies - the new available copies count

    • search

      List<MediaItem> search(String keyword)
      Search for media items by keyword (title, author, isbn, or type)
      Parameters:
      keyword - the search keyword
      Returns:
      list of matching media items

    • existsByIsbn

      boolean existsByIsbn(String isbn)
      Check if a media item exists by ISBN
      Parameters:
      isbn - the ISBN to check
      Returns:
      true if a media item with this ISBN exists
